column1: Robotics, AI and Autonomous Systems MSc
column5: Key informationEmerging technologies such as self-driving cars or reusable spacecraft or Drones are increasingly relying on the design and deployment of autonomous systems. This programme will prepare you to face the challenges of a global market with emphasis on autonomous vehicles and mobile robots operating in ground, air, and space.Course overviewEmerging technologies such as self-driving cars or reusable spacecraft or Drones are increasingly relying on the design and deployment of autonomous systems. This programme will prepare you to face the challenges of a global market with emphasis on autonomous vehicles and mobile robots operating in ground, air, and space.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
column9: 1 year full time, 2 years (up to 28 months) part time
